sqlQuery.name: CompoundAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, source_id as old_source_id FROM webready.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, compound_name, definition, secondary_ids, other_names ,CASE WHEN source_id IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT('', source_id, '') END AS compound_link ,formula FROM webready.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Synonyms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ca.source_id , string_agg(n.name, ', ') as synonyms FROM webready.CompoundAttributes ca LEFT JOIN chebi.names n ON ca.ID = n.compound_id GROUP BY ca.source_id

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count (DISTINCT pc.pathway_id) AS pathway_count, pc.chebi_accession AS source_id FROM webready.PathwayCompounds pc GROUP BY chebi_accession

sqlQuery.name: DefaultStructure
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, default_structure FROM webready.CompoundAttributes c LEFT JOIN ( WITH nodes AS ( SELECT id, compound FROM webready.CompoundId WHERE type IN ('same ID', 'child ID') ) SELECT ca.source_id , s.STRUCTURE AS default_structure FROM webready.CompoundAttributes ca , chebi.structures s , nodes n WHERE ca.source_id = n.compound AND n.id = CONCAT('CHEBI:', s.compound_id) --AND s.id = ds.structure_id AND s.type='mol' AND s.dimension='2D' AND s.default_structure = 'Y' ) s ON c.source_id = s.source_id
